source: Lumen taxonomy: IPTC Media Topics (L1 categories with L2 subcategories, tight) + bilingual seed anchors

modeling.notes: Classify at L2 (subcategories). Derive L1 from parent_id. L1 anchors are retained for completeness but classification should use L2 prototypes.

definitions.en: The staff responsible for the training and on-field management of a sports team

en: The staff responsible for the training and on-field management of a sports team

definitions.en: The executive leadership and owners of a sports team

en: The executive leadership and owners of a sports team

definitions.en: Referees, umpires and other staff who enforce the rules of a sport from on the field of play

en: Referees, umpires and other staff who enforce the rules of a sport from on the field of play

definitions.en: The transfer of an athlete from one team to another, the hiring or drafting of an athlete onto a team or the change in professional status of a player on a team

en: The transfer of an athlete from one team to another, the hiring or drafting of an athlete onto a team or the change in professional status of a player on a team

definitions.en: The study, prediction and reporting of meteorological phenomena
definitions.fr: Etude, observation et prévision des phénomènes météorologiques

en: The study, prediction and reporting of meteorological phenomena
fr: Etude, observation et prévision des phénomènes météorologiques

definitions.en: The long- or short-term meteorological prediction and reporting of the upcoming weather for a given region
definitions.fr: Prévision ou rapport météorologique à long ou à court terme pour une région donnée

en: The long- or short-term meteorological prediction and reporting of the upcoming weather for a given region
fr: Prévision ou rapport météorologique à long ou à court terme pour une région donnée

definitions.en: Short- or long-term meteorological phenomena worthy of study, reporting or public advisory such as climate change, storms, heat waves or tornadoes
definitions.fr: Phénomène météorologique à court ou à long terme digne d'être étudié, signalé ou rapporté tel que le changement climatique, les tempêtes, les vagues de chaleur ou les tornades

en: Short- or long-term meteorological phenomena worthy of study, reporting or public advisory such as climate change, storms, heat waves or tornadoes
fr: Phénomène météorologique à court ou à long terme digne d'être étudié, signalé ou rapporté tel que le changement climatique, les tempêtes, les vagues de chaleur ou les tornades

definitions.en: Numerical facts about the weather such as temperature, barometric pressure, river levels, humidity or high and low tides
definitions.fr: Données numériques telles que la température, le taux d'humidité, la pression atmosphérique, le niveau de crue ou la variation des marées

en: Numerical facts about the weather such as temperature, barometric pressure, river levels, humidity or high and low tides
fr: Données numériques telles que la température, le taux d'humidité, la pression atmosphérique, le niveau de crue ou la variation des marées

definitions.en: Alerts issued to the public about severe or notable weather in their area
definitions.fr: Alertes aux populations les avertissant de conditions météorologiques dangeureuses dans leur région

en: Alerts issued to the public about severe or notable weather in their area
fr: Alertes aux populations les avertissant de conditions météorologiques dangeureuses dans leur région
